name: Quincy Data
goal: Quincy Data, LLC is the leading microwave distributor of extremely low latency market data. The Quincy Extreme Data service offers an integrated and normalized feed of select market data sourced from multiple financial exchanges and is offered in exchange colocation centers around the world at extremely low latencies. Quincy is dedicated to leveling the playing field for electronic markets participants of all sizes.
interests: Competition, Economy, finance and the euro, Research and innovation, Single market
euInitiatives: MiFIDII and ESMA regulations and implementation for use by banks, funds and vendors in this space.
